          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1594618860000,
          "parent_id": "bc844c2c-fccf-4a72-8102-f60bdcf978b4",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["JavaScript"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "// wedge objects: {cx:,cy:,radius:,startAngle:,endAngle:}\n// var wedge={\n//     cx:150, cy:150,  // centerpoint\n//     radius:100,\n//     startAngle:0, endAngle:Math.PI\n// }\n// Return true if the x,y point is inside the closed wedge\n\nfunction isPointInWedge(x,y,wedge){\n    var PI2=Math.PI*2;    \n    var dx=x-wedge.cx;\n    var dy=y-wedge.cy;\n    var rr=wedge.radius*wedge.radius;\n    if(dx*dx+dy*dy>rr){return(false);}\n    var angle=(Math.atan2(dy,dx)+PI2)%PI2;\n    return(angle>=wedge.startAngle && angle<=wedge.endAngle);\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 7
        }
      }
    },
    "space": {}
  }
}
